title: Amazon Kindle Keyword Research | Best Keyword Tool for Kindle Direct Publishing
description:
Would you like to know the best keyword research tool for Amazon KDP? Get deeper insights on keyword research tools in this video about Amazon keywords 2019.

You'll discover five different tools you can use whether you can or cannot afford them. This includes:
• Google Adwords Keyword Planner
• Google Trends
• Incognito Mode
• Keyword Tool Dominator
• And, KDP Rocket aka Publisher Rocket
